name: places/ChIJufHDY9BZwokRHfFvs8BZuWw
adrFormatAddress: 80 8th Ave #709, New York, NY 10011-5126, USA

originalText.text:
Five star is too low for this place for what they have done for me. They saved my life. Thank you so so so much, Maya.

I was in a very very bad place a year ago,  mentally and physically because one of the medications prescribed by my previous psychiatrist almost landed me in a coma, in the middle of which I had to stop seeing him because I couldn’t afford to pay him $400 plus per hour because I was not functional enough to work.

It was a vicious cycle and it took a lot of courage to call Empire, I was so desperate for help and they were the only one who took my Medicaid insurance.

From the receptionist to the Psychiatrist are  SO AMAZING. I can’t say enough good things about them. Maya is incredibly kind and empathic human being and I was consulted every step of the way about my care. Even when I forgot appointments ( executive functioning isn’t the strongest in the middle of an” crisis) and didn’t show up in the teledoc video room, Maya would call my phone and we would have our consult.

Making an appointment was always easy and I actually look forward to calling in for medication refill because of how nice everyone is! Also, getting medication refill was a breeze.

Because of the incredible compassion and care I received from Maya and team, I stabilized from a horrible horrible place to where I could go back to work in less than three months.

Fast forward to nine months, and I am thriving. Got an amazing new job in a leadership position and I am in a very good place mentally and emotionally. Thank you guys god all your hard work and for saving my life.

Healing IS possible with the right help!

originalText.text: Very professional and friendly office, which is not so common these days. I've been to numerous psychiatrists in the past for a lot of money since none of them accepted my insurance. My therapist recommended this practice, and I have been really happy as a patient here. They DO take my insurance, which is amazing since I only have to pay a copay (more than happy to) and everything runs smoothly so I don't have anxiety about my appointments, refills etc..Very much recommend Empire Psychiatry.

originalText.text: Empire Psychiatry is located near Madison Square Park, so it’s convenient for me. They accepted my insurance, so it was no brainer. The Doctors were nice, listened carefully and advised on next steps. They have very nice practice, overall. Many doctors to choose from, flexible schedule. I’m satisfied with Empire Psychiatry's work and staff.

text.text: Empire Psychiatry is located near Madison Square Park, so it’s convenient for me. They accepted my insurance, so it was no brainer. The Doctors were nice, listened carefully and advised on next steps. They have very nice practice, overall. Many doctors to choose from, flexible schedule. I’m satisfied with Empire Psychiatry's work and staff.

originalText.text:
I can't say enough good things about the staff and the practitioners here. I came here for a second opinion for my  teenage son, who has a variety of complex issues that I felt were not being fully addressed by his previous psychiatrist. The staff scheduled us an appointment quickly, and were very pleasant to deal with.

My son saw Dr. Joel who was incredibly thorough and explained everything about his proposed treatment plan. He was extremely knowledgeable and I felt very comfortable with his rationale. We've had two appointments so far and I already see changes in my son, who actually for the first time doesn't mind going to his sessions. I'm very grateful to this psychiatry office for giving us hope.

originalText.text: My best friend, who suffers from anxiety and depression, recommended this practice to me after some bad experiences with a previous psychiatrist. I decided to make an appointment and am so glad I did. The staff here is super welcoming and my prescriber is great. The way I feel is night and day from where I was just a few months ago. I highly recommend this psychiatry practice to anyone going through tough times!
